metadata.feature_description: Provides integration points for social modules like Answers, Blogs, and Discussions.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify social module menu items in PersonaBar Community settings

steps.expected: Community settings page should display with social module options
steps.actual: Community settings page loaded showing Influence goals, Content Moderation, Comment Moderation, Enable WYSIWYG, and Group Home Page settings for all social modules

steps.action: Verify Content Moderation section shows social modules
steps.expected: Content Moderation should list Answers, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events
steps.actual: Content Moderation section displayed with checkboxes for Answers (checked), Discussions (checked), Ideas (checked), and Social Events (checked)

steps.action: Verify Comment Moderation section shows social modules
steps.expected: Comment Moderation should list Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, Wiki
steps.actual: Comment Moderation section displayed with checkboxes for Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, and Wiki

steps.action: Verify Group Home Page dropdown shows all social modules
steps.expected: Dropdown should show Activity, Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Members, Wiki
steps.actual: Group Home Page dropdown expanded showing all options: Activity, Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Members, Wiki

steps.action: Check Answers module presence in Community settings
steps.expected: Answers should be listed in Content Moderation and Enable WYSIWYG sections
steps.actual: Answers module is present in Content Moderation (checked) and Enable WYSIWYG (checked) sections

steps.action: Check Answers module in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.expected: Answers should be an option in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.actual: Answers is listed as an option in the Group Home Page dropdown

steps.action: Check Blogs module presence in Community settings
steps.expected: Blogs should be listed in Comment Moderation section
steps.actual: Blogs module is present in Comment Moderation section with checkbox

steps.action: Check Blogs module in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.expected: Blogs should be an option in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.actual: Blogs is listed as an option in the Group Home Page dropdown

steps.action: Check Discussions module presence in Community settings
steps.expected: Discussions should be listed in Content Moderation, Comment Moderation, and Enable WYSIWYG sections
steps.actual: Discussions module is present in Content Moderation (checked), Comment Moderation, and Enable WYSIWYG (checked) sections

steps.action: Check Discussions module in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.expected: Discussions should be an option in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.actual: Discussions is listed as an option in the Group Home Page dropdown

steps.action: Check Wiki module presence in Community settings
steps.expected: Wiki should be listed in Comment Moderation section
steps.actual: Wiki module is present in Comment Moderation section with checkbox

steps.action: Check Wiki module in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.expected: Wiki should be an option in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.actual: Wiki is listed as an option in the Group Home Page dropdown

steps.action: Check Events module presence in Community settings
steps.expected: Social Events should be listed in Content Moderation, Comment Moderation, and Enable WYSIWYG sections
steps.actual: Social Events module is present in Content Moderation (checked), Comment Moderation, and Enable WYSIWYG (checked) sections

steps.action: Check Events module in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.expected: Events should be an option in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.actual: Events is listed as an option in the Group Home Page dropdown

steps.action: Check Ideas module presence in Community settings
steps.expected: Ideas should be listed in Content Moderation, Comment Moderation, and Enable WYSIWYG sections
steps.actual: Ideas module is present in Content Moderation (checked), Comment Moderation, and Enable WYSIWYG (checked) sections

steps.action: Check Ideas module in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.expected: Ideas should be an option in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.actual: Ideas is listed as an option in the Group Home Page dropdown

observations: Social module integration is fully implemented through the PersonaBar Community settings page
All social modules (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki) are accessible via Group Home Page dropdown
Content Moderation and Comment Moderation settings are available for social modules
WYSIWYG editor can be enabled/disabled per social module type
Influence goals in Community settings track user engagement across social modules including accepted answers, events created, and ideas delivered
Groups page displays social module tabs (Activity, Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Members, Wiki) when viewing a group
The Gamification feature in Settings menu provides additional social module integration through privilege and badge systems
